mapper.insert: INSERT into RecruitNotice(title, contents, regDate, strDate, endDate, recruitDivisionId, writerId, typeId, companyId) VALUES(#{title}, #{contents}, now(), #{strDate}, #{endDate}, #{recruitDivisionId}, 1, #{typeId}, #{companyId})
mapper.update: UPDATE RecruitNotice SET title = #{title}, contents = #{contents}, strDate = #{strDate}, endDate = #{endDate}, recruitDivisionId = #{recruitDivisionId}, typeId = #{typeId}, companyId = #{companyId} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT c.* from (select @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS rNum, a.id, a.cName, a.title, a.contents, a.strDate, a.endDate, a.rdValue, a.tValue, a.regDate, a.writerId from (select * from rn_list WHERE title like '%${param1}%' order by id asc) a, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) b ) c WHERE c.rNum > 0 ORDER BY rNum desc LIMIT #{param2}, 5
